title: My Best Friend Became A Transsexual Girl, And Says He Wants to Marry Me, But I’ll Flat Out Refuse. - Novel Updates
genre: Comedy   Drama   Gender Bender   Romance   School Life
author: Coil   コイル
description:
My best friend, Sou, had a sex-change operation and became a girl.

Saying, “I don’t wanna marry anyone if it’s not you”, he nominated me as his fiancé. But I’ll refuse flat out!

Note: Sou turned 'female' in body but is still male in mind and soul.>
